overview: Mr. Pete drives all the way from the east coast to stay with his buddy Tommy and his sexy wife Rachel. Tommy is so devoted to his wife that whatever she wants she gets. And she wants Mr. Pete. John and Dana get Mark to come over and fix their car, with a job well done they offer him a reward. It was like nothing he could have thought of. Jessy wakes up from a crazy bender in Amber's bed with no memory of how he got there. Will comes into the room and congratulates Jessy for a job well done, than he offers his wife up for a second round. Lea hurts her back while doing acrobats in the living room, so her husband Marco calls masseur Ramon over. When Ramon gets there he gets a naughty surprise.
title: DP My Wife With Me 3
